name: No unexpected highlighting when searching with double quotes

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. In a test channel, post the paragraph to the right:
  2. Search for the following: (that's 2 quotes at the end)
    • test tool ""
inline.testData: do you know a tool for detecting SQLi in a whole website¬ø? I mean, I want it to crawl it and then just test a few payloads (', %27, waitfor delay '0:0:05') , and detect which URL, parameter is vulnerable. Best thing I found is this thing https://nmap.org/nsedoc/scripts/http-sql-injection.html but doesn't work like a charm
inline.expectedResult:
• The message you just posted should be returned in search results with the words "test" and "tool" highlighted.
  • The URL should NOT be highlighted.
